casebody.data:
PENDER COUNTY, et al.
v.
SULLIVAN 14P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Donald Sullivan, Marion P. Sullivan, for Sullivan, Donald, et al. Robert H. Corbett, Attorney at Law, Burgaw, for Pender County, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of January 2018 by Defendants for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
